verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing a song of Zion,
Make way for the King of Kings.
Look, the new horizon
Comes forth in the song we sing.
Chorus:
Our hearts are made for rejoicing,
It's the vision we see that we're voicing,
See the broken hearts mended,
Boundaries extended,
Sons bringing forth a new day.
Sing a new song in Zion,
Joy and celebration,
As we free all creation.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Dance the song of Zion,
Make way for the King of Kings.
Behold a nation follows
Wherever you may lead.
